attributes.title: ✨🧚🏻‍♂️Yuck✨🧚🏻‍♂️
attributes.review: I opened the app up and the first thing I see is the orange that is apparently running the country. When I saw him I didn’t even have the guts to sign up because I felt like ✨🤢✨ gross.

attributes.title: Racist bigot
attributes.review: Help I think this man is a racist and if he is truly a leader he would have lead himself and his WS followers to the cliff and jumped off by now. It’s 2020 and he needs to get with the memo. BLM. This app is filled with misinformation and should be removed!

attributes.title: Awful
attributes.review: This app had the worst looking graphics I’ve ever seen and I’ve never been more disappointed with Apple for letting this be approved onto the App Store. Purely disgusting

attributes.title: TERRIBLE!!!
attributes.review: Ugh this app took a whole year to download and I waited that whole time just to open the app and be met by an ugly orange man! I was promised Spencer Reid! It’s honestly so scary and needs to be taken away immediately!!!!

attributes.title: bad app
attributes.review: This app made me get in a car crash. and it took 3 months to install. it’s just a overall bad app and needs to be taken off the app store😛

attributes.title: Trump
attributes.review: The president is horrible and doesn’t make his words into actions, he is a racist and does not deserve this attention to have an app. It’s horrible and it’s all for attention and it is a horrible app.

attributes.title: Complete garbage
attributes.review:
What type of app is this, this so called “app” shouldn’t even be on the App Store. It’s crashing down phones and is just complete spam. TERRIBLE 
Take it off the app store

attributes.title: horrible app
attributes.review: trump is a racist, homophobic, misogynistic, pedophilic bigot who deserves no place in the white house. trump supporters, u are so brainwashed please don’t vote for trump for the sake of this country. please, before u vote for trump, think about who actually cares about this country and the well-being of it’s citizens. it’s ok to change ur opinions and it’s ok to be wrong. so please please vote blue for the children in america who rely on u for change.

attributes.title: a mess
attributes.review: Thought I’d get this app and instantly become a millionaire turns out.....it didn’t happen the orange man is whack can’t stand the app had it all for maybe 10 minutes super EH personally not my cup of tea.  TRUMP NO 2020

attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: The app crashed my phone. Doesn’t deliver on any of the things it promised. The updates are inaccurate or aren’t even real . Just terrible terrible app.
